comment.author: 7854844@N06
comment._content: isn't that where the long bay gaol is? or would that be "Long Bay" ie somewhere else...?

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: Trial Bay Gaol, you are probably thinking of.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: The last small bit of land visible on the left of the photo on the horizon,  which is about 4.5 km from Horseshoe Bay,  is the promontory which the gaol is on top of.   The small bump on that hill may be the ruin of the gaol,  so it is potentially visible in this photo.   It isn't the square boxy building on the east side of this little bay,  about 300 metres from the photographer.   It is the small bit of land,  much further away,  to the left of that.
